alert.note: Alert for Delta; Luce; Menominee; Northern Schoolcraft; Southern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 01 at 7:26AM EDT until April 01 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT /1 PM CDT/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Northeast winds gusting as high as 50 mph, highest near Lake Superior. * WHERE...Luce, Menominee, Delta, Southern Schoolcraft and Northern Schoolcraft Counties. * WHEN...Until 2 PM EDT /1 PM CDT/ this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds, in combination with wet, heavy snow, may lead to downed tree limbs and power outages.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Delta; Luce; Menominee; Northern Schoolcraft; Southern Schoolcraft
